pages.text: $(li)Waystones can be found in the $(l:patchouli:structures/tower)Towers$(/l) and these can be used to move quickly through the Overworld.
$(li)A Waystone can be activated right clicking while you are pointing on it.
$(li)If you right click again on the Waystone, you will be able to teleport to other Waystone that you have already found during your adventure.
